user_assist.summary: Follow-up for acute depressive symptoms characterized by severe vegetative decline, functional impairment, passive death ideation, and subsequent titration of *Sertraline*.
user_assist.reasoning: The session is a standard psychiatric follow-up focusing on tracking the course of an acute depressive episode. The clinical dialog includes necessary safety assessment (C-SSRS components) and therapeutic medication management (SSRI dose increase) in response to reported treatment failure at the current dose.
